From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To enable monitoring of the environment sensors, use the **environment-monitor shutdown temperature** command in global configuration mode. To disable monitoring of the environment sensors, use the **no** form of this command.
CLIs: no environment-monitor shutdown temperature [ rommon | powerdown ]

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Places the supervisor engine in ROMMON when a major active alarm is identified.
(Optional) Powers down the supervisor engine when a new active major alarm is identified.
